email_content:
Hello,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m writing to outline the core requirements and proposed timeline for the Performance Tracking System (PTS) so our teams can stay aligned as development ramps up.

Key Functional Requirements
• Real-Time Performance Metrics – The platform should present up-to-the-minute KPIs such as project completion rates, sales-target attainment, and customer-service response times.
• Customizable Dashboards – End users need the ability to tailor dashboards so the most relevant metrics for their roles are front and center.
• HR System Integration – The PTS must connect smoothly with Acme Corp’s existing HRIS to provide a unified view of training records, role changes, and performance reviews.

High-Level Timeline
• Development start: next quarter
• Pilot phase: six months following development kickoff, during which we’ll refine features based on user feedback

Next Steps
1. Please confirm that the above requirements reflect your current understanding.
2. Let us know of any additional technical specifications or dependencies we should address before sprint planning begins.
3. If helpful, we can schedule a brief sync early next week to walk through the system architecture in more detail.

Thank you for your partnership. Looking forward to collaborating on a successful launch.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Company]
